contentrichtext.text: '''''[http://en.wikipedia.org/w/wiki.phtml?title=MediaWiki:VfD-Iain_Sinclair&action=edit Add to this deletion debate]''''' * Original research. [[User:Raul654|→Raul654]] 04:06, Mar 26, 2004 (UTC) * Delete. --[[User:Yacht|Yacht]] 04:09, Mar 26, 2004 (UTC) * This should be speedy-delete material. Some happy wiseacre simply clicked on the requested article link. - [[User:Hephaestos|Hephaestos]]|[[User talk:Hephaestos|§]] 04:13, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) *<s> That this article is "original research" is the least of its problems. It's a high school essay about video games, mentioning the name of its author in its first line, that never once mentions the name "Iain Sinclair." I'm in fact trying to delete it now (it's a speedy deletion if there ever was one), but haven't been able to do so. Could another admin please try to delete this one? The process isn't working for me. [[User:Moncrief|Moncrief]] 04:15, Mar 26, 2004 (UTC)</s> * I tried too, didn't work for me either. - [[User:Hephaestos|Hephaestos]]|[[User talk:Hephaestos|§]] 04:18, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) * Delete. Reasons above... but IMO is not even passable for a highschool essay. Stream-of-consciousness "research" into laziness. [[User:Abscissa|Abscissa]] 04:42, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) *OK, I replaced the initial bilge with a (hopefully) acceptable stub, so Keep. [[User:67.124.48.102|67.124.48.102]] 05:48, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) *Keep stub. Nice work. [[User:Meelar|Meelar]] 05:53, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) **Thanks. From some of the comments I read, he seems to be the [[Michael Moore]] of London (instead of corporate America--either love him or hate him. Made me interested in his writing. [[User:Niteowlneils|Niteowlneils]] 05:29, 27 Mar 2004 (UTC) *Keep, now that it's been entirely rewritten and is actually about Iain Sinclair. [[User:Moncrief|Moncrief]] 06:18, Mar 26, 2004 (UTC) *Keep new version. [[User:Fennec|Fennec]] 06:50, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) *I'd like to have it deleted to get rid of the history with the obnoxious essay in it. Then a genuine page can be started with the stub that's there now. -- [[User:Friedo|Friedo]] 07:02, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) **Comment: That's a sensible suggestion, but it's not a reason to delete under current policy, nor technically easy AFAIK now that a genuine article has been written sharing the same history (which is the reason for the policy I guess). Food for thought. [[User:Andrewa|Andrewa]] 03:05, 27 Mar 2004 (UTC) * I have added more detail to the stub so keep - [[User:seaeagle04|seaeagle04]] * Keep, yes. It looks fine now. - [[User:Hephaestos|Hephaestos]]|[[User talk:Hephaestos|§]] 07:20, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) *Keep now. [[User:DJ Clayworth|DJ Clayworth]] 15:36, 26 Mar 2004 (UTC) *Keep -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]] | [[User talk:Cyrius|Talk]] 20:01, Mar 26, 2004 (UTC) *Keep, very good article now. [[User:Premeditated Chaos|PMC]] 04:22, 27 Mar 2004 (UTC)
